CustomField.description: Product catalogue eligible for Special Order app (Leather goods with Stock Request = false or Belts). Used for Now Yours app to display 'Creation' button on the product page
CustomField.formula:
IF ( OR ( Category__r.Name = 'Leather Goods', Category__r.Name = 'Horizon', Category__r.Name = 'Golf Bag', Category__r.Name = 'Horizon Soft', Category2__r.Name = 'EXCLUD NY Creation Sku hidden cat', ReportingCategory__r.Name = 'Mon Damier Graphite', ReportingCategory__r.Name = 'Mon Monogram' ), false,
AND ( OR ( UPPER(ProductGroup__c) = UPPER('Leather goods'), UPPER(ProductReferential__r.SPO_Category__c) = 'BELTS' ) ) )
CustomField.label: Eligible Special Order
